@bekathrills totally. Post japan we are keen to really practice what we preach as well. Take up less space and live lighter on the planet.

@RUOKAnny it shall be a hard road, but hopefully something will pop up. We have even been looking over at Waiheke.

@RUOKAnny We are looking at lots of areas right now, but smaller is defo a key thing for us.. time for us to walk our environmental talk.
@RUOKAnny yeah, we think its finally fallen to the developers! Which was totally always going to happen. Good kick up the bum for us :)

and how the #tech and #innovation community here in NZ is a true community.
